page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content:
The block surveyed is mainly flat with
a ridge of upland lying E to W.Most is farmland given to crops and grass, plus small areas of woodland.There are 3 villages-{Barrington,Stocklinch}and{ {Puckington. {Landscape}of area. {Barrington.} -Population,Industry,Farming,Housing, Historic buildings. {Puckington}-Farming.{Stocklinch} -Farming.{Barrington}-School.{ {Barrington}-School events (Autumn,Spring,Summer). A Schoolboy's Day. A Schoolgirl's Day. {Public Transport.} {Recreational Facilities. { {
